channel.title: PLEASE help AFTER SO LONG
channel.description: i need to know how to host my server other than hamachi. I just want to know how to have them connect to my no-ip instead of hamachi ip. Please tell me. Or at least tell me how to host it without the no-ip and with just an ip not using hamachi.

item.title: PLEASE help AFTER SO LONG
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok run no-ip (you should already have a account) if not just go to www.no-ip.com and sign up
go to www.portforward.com to find out how to port forward and run no-ip and your server.
then register your server on www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

That easy!

Read full topic

item.title: PLEASE help AFTER SO LONG
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

www.no-ip.com

Sign Up
Sign uP A Host
Goto Download Section
Download The Client…(u gotta pick which OS u have)
Open the program
put username and password
and u gonna see your host like: examplehost.no-ip.org or info or etc…
click the little box…unclick it once it says no update needed…

then just log on…on server IP: tyipe that examplehost.no-ip.org

IF YOU HAVE A ROUTER SET IT UP!

Read full topic
